name: Oatly AB
goal: Oatly is a Swedish company that is dedicated to upgrading the lives of individuals and the general well being of the planet through a lineup of original oat drinks. Founded back in the 1990s, the company's patented enzyme technology copies nature's own process and turns fiber rich oats into nutritional liquid food that is perfectly designed for humans.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Consumers, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Single market
euInitiatives: Common Agricultural Policy, Agricultural Policy, Common Market Organisation Regulation, Environment Policy, Climate Policy, Food Safety, Institutional Regulatory Policy.
